评论概述: WAY bigger than it appears in the photos!!
评论详情: My kid ordered this because he’s going for a new look and this (green) bag is his favorite color. It’s a great price and seems rather durable. Plus it looks comfortable and convenient, like a good option if you don’t want to use a backpack. The ONLY thing that we can critique is something that is our own fault for not checking the specs, and that is that the bag is huge in comparison to the actual product photos. My kid ordered it himself and doesn’t understand the posted specifications on anything online, so he just bases sizes off of the post photos. He was hoping it was a tad smaller, but he still LOVES the design and color. I love that this purchase not only made my kid happy but it also taught him a valuable lesson about reading the details when shopping online. He’s finally learning to not take things at face value because you never know how big the model is or how big/small the product will be to him in comparison. So it’s a win win on this purchase. 10/10 recommend

I can throw my perfume, giant water bottle, phone, keys, wallet, TWO hoodies and a sandwich in it.  The strap is adjustable which is great if you like lower hanging bags, the size is perfect for everyday use, it’s comfortable on my shoulder. 评论概述: Using this as a Canvas Grocery Bag
评论详情: For several years I had been trying to find a canvas bag that I could use for grocery shopping that also had a cross body strap like one of the ones I use. It makes it easier for bike riding home from different places. This one is sturdy and thick enough so that I can carry a heavier load, and it supports many different things inside with it size. Well constructed and definitely what I needed!

I already had an army green canvas bag. It held everything just fine BUT, there was no closure, only a flap with velcro to hold the flap down. It was annoying because it never held it. The strap was attached with d rings that turned every which way. I was able to adjust the length but it would only hold for a day then it would twist all around again. THIS BAG THOUGH! It's just as wide, super deep, the handle does what I tell it to, the color is gorgeous, the canvas it sturdy, the pickets are deeper... I carry the bag for work and I can get a loose-leaf binder and a bunch of other stuff in here. LOVE IT
